title: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Boil pasta, cook pancetta, mix eggs and cheese, combine all.
author: RecipeHub

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: Chicken, yogurt, tomato sauce, garam masala, garlic
steps: Marinate chicken, grill it, cook with spiced tomato sauce.
author: RecipeHub

title: Beef Bulgogi
ingredients: Beef, soy sauce, sugar, garlic, sesame oil
steps: Marinate beef, grill over high heat, serve with rice.
author: RecipeHub

title: Sushi Rolls
ingredients: Sushi rice, nori, cucumber, avocado, crab meat
steps: Spread rice on nori, add fillings, roll and slice.
author: RecipeHub

title: Pad Thai
ingredients: Rice noodles, tofu, shrimp, eggs, tamarind sauce
steps: Stir fry tofu and shrimp, add noodles, sauce, and egg.
author: RecipeHub

title: Miso Soup
ingredients: Miso paste, tofu, seaweed, scallions, dashi broth
steps: Heat broth, stir in miso, add tofu and seaweed.
author: RecipeHub

title: Tacos al Pastor
ingredients: Pork, pineapple, achiote paste, onions, cilantro
steps: Marinate pork, grill it, serve in tortillas with toppings.
author: RecipeHub

title: Butter Chicken
steps: Cook chicken, make creamy tomato sauce, simmer together.
author: RecipeHub

title: Tom Yum Soup
ingredients: Shrimp, lemongrass, galangal, lime, chili paste
steps: Boil broth, add aromatics, shrimp, and season.
author: RecipeHub

title: Falafel Wrap
ingredients: Chickpeas, garlic, parsley, flour, pita, tahini
steps: Blend mix, fry balls, wrap with sauce and veggies.
author: RecipeHub

title: Margherita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella, basil
steps: Spread sauce on dough, add cheese and basil, bake.
author: RecipeHub

title: Cheeseburger Soup
ingredients: Ground beef, potatoes, cheese, broth, onions
steps: Brown meat, add vegetables and broth, stir in cheese.
author: RecipeHub

title: Kung Pao Noodles
ingredients: Noodles, chicken, peppers, peanuts, soy sauce
steps: Cook noodles, stir-fry chicken and veggies, mix all.
author: RecipeHub

title: Vegetable Soup
steps: Boil vegetables in broth, add pasta, simmer.
author: RecipeHub

title: Blackberry Smoothie
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth, serve cold.
author: RecipeHub
